results.name: Numerator of 3n/2.
comment: First trisection of A026741. The other trisections are A165355 and A165367.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
maple: A165351:=n->numer(3*n/2); seq(A165351(k), k=0..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Oct 11 2013
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[3 (1 + x + x^2) x/((x - 1)^2 (1 + x)^2), {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Mar 03 2014 *)
